entry.title: DRILL BRUSH KIT – WHITE (2″ROUND, 4″ FLAT, 4″ BULLET) ** DRILL NOT INCLUDED**
entry.summary:
Vendor: Drill Brush
Type: Accessory
Price: 25.00

The kit Includes:

  • 1x White Original bullet brush
  • 1x White 4 inch flat brush
  • 1x White 2 inch Short detail brush

Full Description

This is a set of our softest brushes for use with automotive trim and upholstery. With a brush from each of our shape types, almost every mess is within your reach!

  • The 4 inch flat brush is best used on large flat areas like door panels and windshields.
  • The bullet-shaped original brush can get into curved spaces like armrests and the contours of seats. It’s also great for tight corners and cupholders.
  • The 2 inch detail brush is best for small spots that get missed or need special attention. Instead of spending time and effort scrubbing small messes, just grab our 2 inch brush and let your joints rest easy.

These Drill brushes  are designed for use in your cordless drill. No need to buy a one-trick scrubbing tool to sit around gathering dust. The higher speed and power of a cordless drill allows you to cut through messes up to twice as fast as hand scrubbing. While our competitors’ brushes often break under heavy loads, these are built to last!

Each brush features:

  • Our low stiffness non-scratch nylon bristles
  • A steel shaft with rust resistant nickel plating
  • A strong polypropylene plastic block for high durability
  • A 1/4 inch quick change shaft for use in any drill or impact driver

All the brushes use our white soft stiffness bristles, and are designed not to leave scratches on most surfaces even under heavy use.

** DRILL NOT INCLUDED**
